declarations.comments:
A layer that requires dependencies (req), may fail with (err),
and produces a value (typically Record prov).
Each layer has a unique identity used for automatic memoization within a Scope.
declarations.title: OmLayer

declarations.comments:
A first-class representation of resource lifetime and memoization.
Finalizers are registered via `acquireRelease` and run in reverse order
when the scope is closed. Layers are automatically memoized by identity
within a scope — the same layer value builds only once.
declarations.title: Scope

declarations.comments:
Create a layer from an Om computation.
The layer is automatically memoized within a Scope — the same layer value
used in multiple branches of a dependency graph builds only once.
declarations.title: makeLayer

declarations.comments:
Create a scoped layer with acquire/release semantics.
The release function runs when the enclosing scope closes.
The layer requires `scope :: Scope` in its context.
declarations.title: makeScopedLayer

declarations.comments:
Bracket-style scoped layer: acquire a resource, register its release,
then build provisions from it.
declarations.title: bracketLayer

declarations.comments:
Acquire a resource and register its release with the current scope.
This is the core scoped resource primitive — the PureScript equivalent
of ZIO's `ZIO.acquireRelease`.
declarations.title: acquireRelease

declarations.comments:
Create a fresh (non-memoized) copy of a layer.
The new layer has a unique identity and will always build independently,
even within the same scope.
declarations.title: fresh

declarations.comments: Run a layer with a given context, with custom error if requirements aren't met.
declarations.title: runLayer

declarations.comments:
Build a fully-provided scoped layer, return the provisions.
All finalizers run after the provisions are returned.
For layers with typed errors, use `runScopedWith`.
declarations.title: runScoped

declarations.comments: Like `runScoped` but accepts error handlers for layers with typed errors.
declarations.title: runScopedWith

declarations.comments:
Build a fully-provided scoped layer and pass the provisions to a callback.
A fresh `Scope` is created and closed when the callback completes,
running all finalizers in reverse order — whether by success, failure,
or interruption.
For layers with typed errors, use `withScopedWith`.
declarations.title: withScoped

declarations.comments: Like `withScoped` but accepts error handlers for layers with typed errors.
declarations.title: withScopedWith

declarations.comments: Remove `scope :: Scope` from a RowList (it's always present, just noise).
declarations.title: FilterScope

declarations.comments: Given a label, find which layer in the RowList provides it.
declarations.title: FindProvider

declarations.comments: Dispatch based on whether the current layer has the label.
declarations.title: FindProviderMatch

declarations.comments: Check if a RowList contains a given label.
declarations.title: HasLabel

declarations.comments: Emit D2 edges for one consumer: "provider -> consumer" per requirement.
declarations.title: EmitEdges

declarations.comments: Walk all layers emitting D2 edges.
declarations.title: PrintLayersRL

declarations.comments: Check if all required dependencies are provided.
declarations.title: CheckAllProvided

declarations.comments: Check that all labels in required RowList exist in available RowList.
declarations.title: CheckAllLabelsExist

declarations.comments: Check if a single label exists in the available RowList.
declarations.title: CheckLabelExists
